blurb: Z3 is a theorem prover from Microsoft Research. It is ideal for determining if mathematical equations have a solution and for solving those equations very quickly if there is a possible solution.

key_features.title: Batteries Included
key_features.content: Epic & well-documented standard library. Need more? Use a PyPi package - there's one for everything.

key_features.title: Easy
key_features.content: Human-friendly Syntax and a vibrant, supportive community. Quick to learn & intuitive to use.

key_features.title: Extensible
key_features.content: Need to call Fortran from a web API? Done. Need to process images using C? Python can do that.

key_features.title: Flexible
key_features.content: Duck, dynamic, & strong typing. Easy to debug. Fun for experiments, robust for large applications.

key_features.title: Multi-paradigm
key_features.content: OOP, structured, functional, & aspect-oriented. Adaptable to how you structure your programs.

key_features.title: Ubiquitous
key_features.content: Accepted for almost any use. Easily interface with other languages & execute almost everywhere.
